segments.text: I see a woman standing at the sink, seemingly absorbed in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet, the water is overflowing from the basin, creating a small pool on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is already in the puddle, but she doesn’t seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s almost like she’s in her own little world, completely unaware of the chaos around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can imagine the frustration of the water damage that will follow this neglect.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinet doors are wide open, and I notice a glimmer of cookies inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a contrast to the serious situation at hand.
segments.speaker: PAR
